en.bdb: Being without Guru but getting called the Guru

verse.gurmukhi: rwqI nINgr Kyldy sB hoie iekTy[
verse.unicode: ਰਾਤੀ ਨੀਂਗਰ ਖੇਲਦੇ ਸਭ ਹੋਇ ਇਕਠੇ।

en.bdb: Children play getting together in the evening.

transliteration.english: raatee nee(n)gar kheladhe sabh hoi ikaThe|
transliteration.hindi: राती नींगर खेलदे सभ होइ इकठे।
transliteration.en: raatee nee(n)gar kheladhe sabh hoi ikaThe|
transliteration.hi: राती नींगर खेलदे सभ होइ इकठे।
transliteration.ipa: rɑt̪i niⁿGər kʰeləd̪e səɓ hɔeɪ eɪkəʈʰe.
transliteration.ur: راتیِ نیِںگر کھےلدے سبھ هوا اکٹھے۔

verse.gurmukhi: rwjw prjw hovdy kir sWg aupTy[
verse.unicode: ਰਾਜਾ ਪਰਜਾ ਹੋਵਦੇ ਕਰਿ ਸਾਂਗ ਉਪਠੇ।

en.bdb: Someone disguised as King and the rest as subjects, they enact ridiculous scenes.

transliteration.english: raajaa parajaa hovadhe kar saa(n)g upaThe|
transliteration.hindi: राजा परजा होवदे करि साँग उपठे।
transliteration.en: raajaa parajaa hovadhe kar saa(n)g upaThe|
transliteration.hi: राजा परजा होवदे करि साँग उपठे।
transliteration.ipa: rɑd͡ʒɑ pərəd͡ʒɑ hɔʋəd̪e kər sɑⁿəG oʊpəʈʰe.
transliteration.ur: راجا پرجا هوودے کر ساںگ اُپٹھے۔

verse.gurmukhi: ieik lskr lY Dwvdy ieik iPrdy nTy[
verse.unicode: ਇਕਿ ਲਸਕਰ ਲੈ ਧਾਵਦੇ ਇਕਿ ਫਿਰਦੇ ਨਠੇ।

en.bdb: Some of them leading the army rush from place to place and some getting defeated flee helter-skelter.

transliteration.english: eik lasakar lai dhaavadhe ik firadhe naThe|
transliteration.hindi: इकि लसकर लै धावदे इकि फिरदे नठे।
transliteration.en: eik lasakar lai dhaavadhe ik firadhe naThe|
transliteration.hi: इकि लसकर लै धावदे इकि फिरदे नठे।
transliteration.ipa: eɪk ləsəkər læ t̪ɑʋəd̪e eɪk fɪrəd̪e nəʈʰe.
transliteration.ur: ِاک لسکر لَے دھاودے اک پھردے نٹھے۔

verse.gurmukhi: TIkrIAW hwly Brin auie Kry AsTy[
verse.unicode: ਠੀਕਰੀਆਂ ਹਾਲੇ ਭਰਨਿ ਉਇ ਖਰੇ ਅਸਠੇ।

en.bdb: They pay tax by offering potshreds and thus become wise.

transliteration.english: Theekareeaa(n) haale bharan ui khare asaThe|
transliteration.hindi: ठीकरीआँ हाले भरनि उइ खरे असठे।
transliteration.en: Theekareeaa(n) haale bharan ui khare asaThe|
transliteration.hi: ठीकरीआँ हाले भरनि उइ खरे असठे।
transliteration.ipa: ʈʰikəriəɑⁿ hɑle ɓərən oʊeɪ kʰəre əsəʈʰe.
transliteration.ur: ٹھیِکریِآں هالے بھرن اُا کھرے اسٹھے۔

verse.gurmukhi: iKn ivic Kyf aujwiVdy Gru Gru nUM qRTy[
verse.unicode: ਖਿਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਖੇਡ ਉਜਾੜਿਦੇ ਘਰੁ ਘਰੁ ਨੂੰ ਤ੍ਰਠੇ।

en.bdb: Within few moments they ruin their game and run for their homes.

transliteration.english: khin vich khedd ujaaRidhe ghar ghar noo(n) traThe|
transliteration.hindi: खिन विचि खेड उजाड़िदे घरु घरु नूँ त्रठे।
transliteration.en: khin vich khedd ujaaRidhe ghar ghar noo(n) traThe|
transliteration.hi: खिन विचि खेड उजाड़िदे घरु घरु नूँ त्रठे।
transliteration.ipa: kʰɪn ʋɪt͡ʃ kʰeɖ oʊd͡ʒɑɽɪd̪e Gʰər Gʰər nuŋ t̪ɹəʈʰe.
transliteration.ur: کھٍن وچ کھےڈ اُجاڑدے گھر گھر نُوں ترٹھے۔

verse.gurmukhi: ivxu guxu gurU sdwiedy Eie Koty mTy ]9]
verse.unicode: ਵਿਣੁ ਗੁਣੁ ਗੁਰੂ ਸਦਾਇਦੇ ਓਇ ਖੋਟੇ ਮਠੇ ॥੯॥

en.bdb: Those who without merit call themselves Guru, are sluggish dissemblers.

transliteration.english: vin gun guroo sadhaidhe oi khoTe maThe ||9||
transliteration.hindi: विणु गुणु गुरू सदाइदे ओइ खोटे मठे ॥९॥
transliteration.en: vin gun guroo sadhaidhe oi khoTe maThe ||9||
transliteration.hi: विणु गुणु गुरू सदाइदे ओइ खोटे मठे ॥९॥
transliteration.ipa: ʋɪɳ Gʊɳ Gʊru səd̪ɑeɪd̪e oeɪ kʰɔʈe məʈʰe.9.
transliteration.ur: وِݨ گُݨ گُرُو سداادے اوِا کھوٹے مٹھے ۔۔۹۔۔
